definitions.text: electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds
examples: I talked to him on the telephone

definitions.text: (phonetics) an individual sound unit of speech without concern as to whether or not it is a phoneme of some language
electro-acoustic transducer for converting electric signals into sounds; it is held over or inserted into the ear
examples: it was not the typing but the earphones that she disliked

definitions.text: get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone
examples: I tried to call you all night
Take two aspirin and call me in the morning
